attributes.action: educate 5 year olds and upwards about pedophiles and predators the tactics they use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: education from primary school upwards on the dangers posed by pedophiles and predators,all the tactics they use and how to beat them.If children are educated to see the problem before it gets serious,then we can beat child abuse.the rights of the child are paramount for their develoment.
